protocol.text: The data were normalized with RMA algorithm using Gene-Spring GX default analysis settings ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA signal intensity
23-day-old wild type treated with water or 1 mM SA at ZT24 or ZT36. Three biological replicates were used.

Arabidopsis seedlings were grown at 21-24°C, 12-hour day length, 60% relative humidity. The seedlings were transfer to constant light condition for 24 hours before treatment and left in constant light condition after treatment
Total RNA was isolated from the frozen material using Invitrogen TRIzol.
RNA probes were labelled using the Ambion MessageAmp Premier.
aRNA were hybridized to GeneChip®in Affymetrix GeneChip® hybridization oven 645, washed in Affymetrix GeneChip® Fluidics Station 450
GeneChips were scanned using Affymetrix GeneChip® Scanner 7G
